name: PythonStudies
tagline: Created to make studying Python from different machines a lot easier.  Feel free to use anything here, but they probably won't be of much use to anybody other than me.
body:
### Welcome to my Python Studies Page.
I have created this project just to make my life easier when I am ~~screwing~~ studying/playing about with Python code on different machines, without having to manually export and import from one to the other each time.

Anybody is welcome to use any of the files and programs on the repository, which will generally just be programs testing out something new I have just learned, or maybe seeing if Python can be used to solve a specific problem I have encountered.

### Authors and Contributors
For the puposes of this project, I (@FallenVagrant) am the sole author and contributor.  Should anybody see better ways of doing something I've done in my programs and wish to share the love, feel free to let me know.  Any advice is always appreciated.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
